snippet: Supporters of the Syrian uprising were reminded Monday that having their revolution documented can be a mixed blessing, as a video appeared to show rebel fighters hurling dead soldiers off a roof.
abstract: Supporters of the Syrian uprising were reminded Monday that having their revolution documented can be a mixed blessing, as a video appeared to show rebel fighters hurling dead soldiers off a roof.

headline.main: Grisly Scene After Syrian Rebel Victory Caught on Video
